blackscreentransition
So I was hoping you could help me to figure out what's going on with my father and the cult...
Did you say that the cult is searching for demons invading this world?
Yes.
No, this is wrong.
Eh?
Demons do not invade this world in physical form.
They can't leave their dimension at will and enter here.
What they do instead is influence and corrupt other beings. In some cases to an extreme degree.
Like local dwarves who turned into bloodthirsty maniacs, or faeries being massive bitches.
That explains quite a lot.
I had no idea. What are demons really then?
They are entities from another dimension, who generally seek a life energy which they feed on.
Violence, negative emotions, things like this. They would gladly enter this world but most aren't powerful enough for that.
Once defeated they return to their realm, but strong light power can kill them entirely.
From the sound of it, I'd guess your father isn't quite himself anymore.
But spare me from these worldly worries. Is there something else?
Actually yes, I wanna know who you really are.
You don't take me for a God?
Hardly.
Haha, well, let's say I'm sort of a traveller like you, except that I came here willingly.
Is that so?
Well... I willingly escaped my pursuers a long time ago and chose this world.
So you are basically a fugitive. Got it.
Shhh, don't tell anyone.
You can move through dimensions on will?
Yes, kind of, it's the power I possess. Envious? You can't have it.
No, but we could use your help to go home.
Hah. Hahahah.
Could you please do that?
Hmh... I could. For this you'd have to bring me something first.
There are four elements. Earth, Water, Fire and Air.
Their existence is focused in certain places, deep underground, vast oceans, skies and so on.
Bring me one of-
